appName.description: Web Monetization is a browser API that allows the creation of a payment stream from the user agent to the website.

appDescription.description: Web Monetization is a browser API that allows the creation of a payment stream from the user agent to the website.

hostsPermissionsNeeded.message: Permission to access your data for all websites is required to use Web Monetization.
